name: The Assumption of the Virgin
description: The Assumption of the Virgin; Peter Paul Rubens (Flemish, 1577 - 1640); about 1613 - 1614; Pen and brown ink, brown wash over black chalk, incised for transfer; 30 × 18.9 cm (11 13/16 × 7 7/16 in.); 83.GG.198; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Assumption of the Virgin
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash over black chalk, incised for transfer
